name: The Little Gods
description:
This game was made for the 2018 Winnipeg Game Jam. All of the art and audio was completed within 48 hours. The programming took a little bit longer though. Enjoy!

There is a little god for just about anything you can think of.

Things are just better when these gods are around. For example, a tree god might keep the tree healthy while a mailbox god could increase the chances of good news.

But sometimes a god will abandon their dwelling..

That's where you come in. You are an employee of the Little God Task Force (LGTF) and it is your job to entice these little gods into returning. 

To do this, you'll be placing tiny items around their dwelling. Depending on the type of god, the god will either love, hate, or be indifferent to each item that you place.

You can only place a limited number of items. If you've placed the maximum amount and nothing has happened you'll need to swap out some items to get a combination that results in a reaction from the god.


Please all 3 of the gods to win the game!
